0.1.0.name: express-graphql
0.1.0.description: Create a GraphQL HTTP server with Express.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.coveralls: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

0.1.0.deprecated: This package is no longer maintained. We recommend using `graphql-http` instead. Please consult the migration document https://github.com/graphql/graphql-http#migrating-express-grpahql.

0.6.5.name: express-graphql

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && babel src --ignore __tests__ --out-dir dist && npm run build:flow
scripts.build:flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/dist\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.cover:lcov: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha

0.6.5.deprecated: This package is no longer maintained. We recommend using `graphql-http` instead. Please consult the migration document https://github.com/graphql/graphql-http#migrating-express-grpahql.

0.8.0.name: express-graphql

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && babel src --ignore __tests__ --out-dir dist && npm run build:flow
scripts.build:flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/dist\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.cover:lcov: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
